info.title: Chemezy Backend Engine
info.description: The source code of reality for the Chemezy game universe

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token.

get.description: Get current user profile.
Get user by ID.

post.description:
Process a chemical reaction prediction request.

This endpoint takes a list of reactant chemical IDs and their quantities,
predicts the resulting products and effects, and returns a structured
prediction.

get.description: Retrieve the user's reaction cache.

schema.title: Response Get Reaction Cache Api V1 Reactions Cache Get

get.description: Retrieve statistics about the user's reactions and discoveries.

post.description:
Create a new chemical from a molecular formula.
This will trigger a call to an LLM to generate the chemical's properties.

get.description: Retrieve all chemicals with pagination.
Get a specific chemical by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a chemical by its ID.
Clear all reactions from the database.
Request deletion of a specific reaction.
Clear all chemicals from the database.
Request deletion of a specific chemical.

get.description:
Retrieve current user's awards with optional filtering and sorting.

- **category**: Optional filter by award category
- **sort_by**: Field to sort by (granted_at, tier, template_name)
- **sort_order**: Sort order (asc, desc)
- **skip**: Number of records to skip for pagination
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

schema.title: Response Get My Awards Api V1 Awards Me Get

get.description:
Retrieve available awards for the current user with progress information.

Shows awards that the user hasn't earned yet, along with their progress
toward earning each award.

- **category**: Optional filter by award category

schema.title: Response Get Available Awards Api V1 Awards Available Get

get.description:
Get leaderboard rankings for a specific award category.

Returns top users ranked by total points earned in the specified category.
Uses caching for improved performance.

- **category**: Award category to rank by
- **limit**: Maximum number of users to return (1-100)
- **include_ties**: Whether to include tied users beyond the limit

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of users to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return

schema.title: Response Get Leaderboard Api V1 Awards Leaderboard  Category  Get

get.description:
Retrieve awards for a specific user (public profile viewing).

This endpoint allows viewing another user's awards if they have enabled
public profile viewing or if the requesting user is viewing their own awards.

- **user_id**: ID of the user whose awards to retrieve
- **category**: Optional filter by award category
- **sort_by**: Field to sort by (granted_at, tier, template_name)
- **sort_order**: Sort order (asc, desc)
- **skip**: Number of records to skip for pagination
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

schema.title: Response Get User Awards Api V1 Awards User  User Id  Get

get.description:
Get overall leaderboard rankings across all award categories.

Returns top users ranked by total points earned across all categories.
Uses caching for improved performance.

- **limit**: Maximum number of users to return (1-100)
- **include_ties**: Whether to include tied users beyond the limit

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of users to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return

schema.title: Response Get Overall Leaderboard Api V1 Awards Leaderboard Overall Get

get.description:
Get current user's rank in the leaderboard.

Returns the user's position and statistics in the specified category
or overall leaderboard if no category is specified.

- **category**: Optional category to check rank in (None for overall)

parameters.name: category

schema.description: Category to check rank in (None for overall)
schema.title: Category

parameters.description: Category to check rank in (None for overall)

get.description:
Get recent award achievements for community feed.

Returns recent awards granted to users for community engagement features.
Uses caching for improved performance.

- **limit**: Maximum number of achievements to return (1-50)
- **category**: Optional filter by award category

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of achievements to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of achievements to return

get.description:
Get statistics about award distribution across categories.

Returns community-wide statistics about awards and user engagement.
Uses caching for improved performance.

Get comprehensive dashboard statistics for the current user.

Returns statistics about user's awards, progress, and achievements.

Get recent awards for the current user.

Returns awards earned within the specified timeframe.

parameters.name: days_back

schema.description: Number of days back to look for awards
schema.title: Days Back

parameters.description: Number of days back to look for awards

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of awards to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of awards to return

get.description:
Get current user's progress toward unearned awards.

Returns progress information including category breakdowns and next milestones.

Get award notifications for the current user.

Returns notifications about recent awards and achievements.

post.description:
Mark specific notifications as read.

Accepts a list of notification IDs to mark as read.

Create a new award template.

Only admin users can create award templates.

get.description:
Get all award templates with optional filtering.

Only admin users can view all award templates.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.description:
Get a specific award template by ID.

Only admin users can view award template details.

put.description:
Update an existing award template.

Only admin users can update award templates.

post.description:
Activate an award template.

Only admin users can activate award templates.

Deactivate an award template.

Only admin users can deactivate award templates.

Manually grant an award to a user.

Only admin users can manually grant awards.

Revoke an award from a user.

Only admin users can revoke awards.

get.description:
Retrieve audit logs with filtering options.

Only admin users can access audit logs.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

schema.title: Response Get Audit Logs Api V1 Admin Monitoring Audit Logs Get

get.description:
Get system health statistics.

Only admin users can access system health data.

Get activity statistics for a specific user.

Only admin users can access user activity data.

Get monitoring alerts based on system behavior.

Only admin users can access monitoring alerts.

post.description:
Clean up old audit logs to prevent database bloat.

Only admin users can perform log cleanup.

parameters.name: days_to_keep

schema.description: Number of days of logs to keep
schema.title: Days To Keep

parameters.description: Number of days of logs to keep

get.description:
Get comprehensive admin dashboard with system statistics.

Only admin users can access the admin dashboard.

Get configuration information and system status.

Only admin users can access configuration information.

Get all feature flags and their current status.

Only admin users can access feature flag information.

Get a specific feature flag configuration.

Only admin users can access feature flag details.

post.description:
Toggle a feature flag between enabled and disabled.

Only admin users can toggle feature flags.

Reload configuration from file.

Only admin users can reload configuration.

get.description:
Get enabled features for a specific user or the current admin user.

Only admin users can check user features.

Get overall system status based on configuration.

Only admin users can access system status.
Root endpoint serves the index.html file.
Health check endpoint.

AuditAction.title: AuditAction
AuditAction.description: Enum for different types of audit actions.

target_user_id.title: Target User Id
target_user_id.description: User who was affected by the action

entity_type.title: Entity Type
entity_type.description: Type of entity affected (award, template, etc.)

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the action (success, failure, warning)

AvailableAwardSchema.title: AvailableAwardSchema
AvailableAwardSchema.description: Schema for available award with progress information.

AwardCategory.title: AwardCategory
AwardCategory.description: Categories for different types of awards.

molecular_formula.title: Molecular Formula
molecular_formula.description: The molecular formula of the chemical, e.g., 'H2O'.

context.title: Context
context.description: Optional context or name hint to help identify the specific compound, e.g., 'vitamin C', 'table salt'.

DebugClearResponseSchema.title: DebugClearResponseSchema
DebugClearResponseSchema.description: Schema for debug clear operation response.

DebugDeletionRequestSchema.title: DebugDeletionRequestSchema
DebugDeletionRequestSchema.description: Schema for debug deletion request input.

DebugDeletionResponseSchema.title: DebugDeletionResponseSchema
DebugDeletionResponseSchema.description: Schema for debug deletion request response.

Environment.title: Environment
Environment.description: Defines the valid environments for a chemical reaction.

FeatureFlagDetailSchema.title: FeatureFlagDetailSchema
FeatureFlagDetailSchema.description: Schema for single feature flag detail response.

FeatureFlagToggleResponseSchema.title: FeatureFlagToggleResponseSchema
FeatureFlagToggleResponseSchema.description: Schema for feature flag toggle response.

FeatureFlagsResponseSchema.title: FeatureFlagsResponseSchema
FeatureFlagsResponseSchema.description: Schema for feature flags list response.

bubble_size.title: Bubble Size
bubble_size.description: Size of the bubbles in the foam.

stability.title: Stability
stability.description: How long the foam lasts in seconds.

intensity.title: Intensity
intensity.description: Intensity of the gas production (0.0 to 1.0).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the effect in seconds.

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: Radius of the light emission in meters.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the effect in seconds.

NotificationMarkReadResponseSchema.title: NotificationMarkReadResponseSchema
NotificationMarkReadResponseSchema.description: Schema for notification mark read response.

NotificationMarkReadSchema.title: NotificationMarkReadSchema
NotificationMarkReadSchema.description: Schema for marking notifications as read.

PaginatedAwardTemplatesSchema.title: PaginatedAwardTemplatesSchema
PaginatedAwardTemplatesSchema.description: Schema for paginated award templates response.

is_soluble.title: Is Soluble
is_soluble.description: Whether the product is soluble in the reaction environment

state_of_product.title: State Of Product
state_of_product.description: The state of matter of the products, if applicable. Can be 'solid', 'liquid', 'gas', or 'plasma'.

amount_percentage.title: Amount Percentage
amount_percentage.description: Percentage of the volume that spills.

spread_radius.title: Spread Radius
spread_radius.description: Radius the spill spreads to in meters.

product_chemical_id.title: Product Chemical Id
product_chemical_id.description: ID of the product chemical undergoing a state change.

final_state.title: Final State
final_state.description: The final state of matter for the product.

SystemHealthSchema.title: SystemHealthSchema
SystemHealthSchema.description: Schema for system health statistics response.

delta_celsius.title: Delta Celsius
delta_celsius.description: Change in temperature in degrees Celsius.

product_chemical_id.title: Product Chemical Id
product_chemical_id.description: ID of the product chemical undergoing a texture change.

color.title: Color
color.description: Resulting color of the textured product.

viscosity.title: Viscosity
viscosity.description: Viscosity of the new texture (0.0 to 1.0).

UserActivitySchema.title: UserActivitySchema
UserActivitySchema.description: Schema for user activity statistics response.

UserReactionStatsSchema.title: UserReactionStatsSchema
UserReactionStatsSchema.description: Schema for user reaction statistics response.

factor.title: Factor
factor.description: Factor of volume change (e.g., 1.5 for 50% expansion).
